attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I believe that all carers should be entitled by law to one complete week of respite a year  as a break from caring 24/7 for the family members

rejection.details: Please amend the title of your petition-- at the moment there are no spaces. Once you have added them, please resubmit it.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
